name: Emmitt Smith Football
overview: Emmitt Smith, considered to be one of the greatest running backs in professional football, is now crashing into your living room. His mesmerizing moves and superior speed are rolled-up together with the down and dirty action of a real pro-football game. - Only Emmitt Smith Football has the PLAY EDITOR to create customized offensive and defensive plays! - Save function allows access to 64 custom plays at any one time! - Never miss a move with multiple camera angles and 360 degree instant replays! - Digitized sound effects intensify every bone-crushing blow!
